text: Sarah Wayne Callies (born June 1, 1977) is an American actress. She is known for TV roles such as Sara Tancredi in Fox's Prison Break (2005–2009; 2017), Lori Grimes in AMC's The Walking Dead (2010–2013; 2018) and Katie Bowman in USA Network's Colony (2016–2018). Callies was born in La Grange, Illinois. She grew up in Honolulu, Hawaii. She married Josh Winterhalt in 2002. The couple have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Actors from Honolulu Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:People from La Grange, Illinois
title: Sarah Wayne Callies
